Welcome to Project AMORA’s documentation!¶

Project AMORA is a project of the Automation and Robotics Lab (LARA) with field robots of the Pioneer family. Here you will know all about our robots and how to run our software.

This site contain documentation of:

  • Hardware
  • Software
